headline: The Right Way to Book Hotel Rooms for a Wedding
abstract: Experts share advice on what to consider before you book a room block for your wedding.
lead_paragraph: No one told my wife and me that planning a wedding would be easy, but we thought reserving a hotel block — a cluster of 10 rooms or more, at a reduced rate, at a hotel where our out-of-town guests could stay — would be a cinch.
